resources.string: Search for a match or a friend

Welcome to PadelLink, your ultimate padel companion app. This guide will help you navigate through all the features and make the most out of your padel experience.

Creating and Joining a Game

To create a game:

  • Go to the Create Game section from the main menu.
  • Fill in the details such as time, date, and location.
  • Invite players from your contact list or the community.
  • Once all details are set, click Create to schedule your game.

To join a game:

  • Navigate to the Find Games section from the main menu.
  • Browse through the list of available games.
  • Select the game you wish to join and click Join.

Leaving a Game

  • Go to the My Games section from the main menu.
  • Select the game you wish to leave.
  • Click the Leave Game button.

Searching for Players

  • Navigate to the Home screen.
  • Use the search bar at the top of the screen.
  • Enter the full name of the player you are looking for.
  • Select the player from the search results to view their profile or send a match request.

Player Profiles

Each player has a profile that showcases their skill level, playing style, and achievements. You can view your profile and others to get a better understanding of potential partners or opponents.

Community and Events

Connect with other players, form doubles partnerships, and join local events and tournaments through the Community section. Stay updated with the latest events and enhance your padel network.

Support

If you need further assistance, please visit the Support section or contact our support team directly through the app.

Thank you for choosing PadelLink! We hope you have an enjoyable padel experience.

Welcome to PadelLink, the ultimate companion for padel enthusiasts. Our mission is to enhance your padel experience by providing a comprehensive platform designed to connect players, facilitate match scheduling, and streamline court reservations.

Our Features:

• Player Profiles: Create and customize your personal profile, showcasing your skill level, playing style, and achievements.

• Match Scheduling: Effortlessly schedule matches with friends or new partners, with easy-to-use tools for coordinating times and locations.

• Court Reservations: Reserve courts at your favorite clubs directly through the app, ensuring you always have a place to play.

• Community Building: Connect with other players, form doubles partnerships, and join local events and tournaments.

Whether you’re looking to improve your game, find new playing partners, or simply enjoy the sport more, our app is here to help. Join our growing community of padel enthusiasts and take your game to the next level.

Thank you for choosing PadelLink! Let’s play!

App made by: Ricardo Vieira
